accumulated_text: {"entities":[{"description":"Amber is the reincarnated protagonist who formerly lived as a Pokemon fan in another world. She now inhabits the body of Dr. Fuji's deceased daughter, Amber, creating a complex identity crisis. She struggles with existential dread, guilt, and adjusting to her new childlike body.","narrative_role":"Protagonist navigating the complexities of her new life and identity.","significance_level":"Central","entity_type":"Character","identifier":"Amber (Reincarnated)","aliases":["Amber"],"related_entities":["Dr. Fuji","Ditto","Mewtwo"]},{"description":"Dr. Fuji is a middle-aged scientist and Amber's father in her new life. He is deeply emotional and caring, having been affected by the loss of his original daughter. He is conducting experiments related to Pokemon cloning and genetic engineering.","narrative_role":"Amber's father and a key figure in her new life, providing support and stability.","significance_level":"Major","entity_type":"Character","identifier":"Dr. Fuji","aliases":[],"related_entities":["Amber (Reincarnated)","Mewtwo"]},{"description":"Ditto is a shapeshifting Pokemon that was tasked by Dr. Fuji to protect Amber. It has developed a personality and frequently mimics Amber's actions.","narrative_role":"Amber's companion and protector, providing emotional support and assistance in battles.","significance_level":"Major","entity_type":"Character","identifier":"Ditto","aliases":[],"related_entities":["Amber (Reincarnated)","Dr. Fuji"]},{"description":"Mewtwo is a powerful Psychic-type Pokemon created by Dr. Fuji through genetic engineering. It possesses immense power and is currently at large after escaping the laboratory.","narrative_role":"Antagonistic force that poses a potential threat to Amber and others.","significance_level":"Major","entity_type":"Character","identifier":"Mewtwo","aliases":[],"related_entities":["Dr. Fuji","Amber (Reincarnated)"]},{"description":"Celadon Gym is a location where trainers gather for battles and challenges. It features a modern architectural style and various facilities for trainers.","narrative_role":"Setting for Amber's exploration and first battle experience.","significance_level":"Major","entity_type":"Location","identifier":"Celadon Gym","aliases":[],"related_entities":["Amber (Reincarnated)"]},{"description":"Gloom is a Pokemon encountered by Amber in the greenhouse. It displays a melancholic yet curious demeanor and interacts with Ditto's transformed form.","narrative_role":"Local wildlife that represents the living, dynamic environment of the Pokemon world.","significance_level":"Relevant","entity_type":"Character","identifier":"Gloom","aliases":[],"related_entities":["Ditto"]},{"description":"Ponytail Patty is a gym trainer who confronts Amber in the greenhouse.
